pr_title: [BEAM-10670] Make Read execute as a splittable DoFn by default for the Java DirectRunner.

timeline.bodyText: This is effectively a duplicate of AvroIOTest$SimpleTests.testReadDisplayData and doesn't need to a be a validates runner test since it doesn't run a pipeline.
timeline.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText: (here and below) This was previously throwing the top level exception but DirectRunner wraps ParDo exceptions with PipelineExecutionException but BoundedSource/UnboundedSource used a different code path and hence a different exception handling path.

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to make beam_fn_api_use_deprecated_read and use_deprecated_read into one use_deprecated_read since they seem to the same.
timeline.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText: I wanted to use one that wasn't coupled to beam_fn_api so that users of non portable pipelines wouldn't be confused. I also don't want to impact existing users until we start removing the experiment so I needed to support both.
